Package GeneticAlgorithm

Class MealOption

java.lang.Object
GeneticAlgorithm.MealOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable
public class MealOption extends Object implements Serializable, Runnable
An instance of this class represents a single option in a meal. This class contains methods for running the genetic algorithm to create the meal option,
Author:
kxg708

  • Field Details

    • POPULATION_SIZE

      public static int POPULATION_SIZE
      The population size for the genetic algorithm.

    • K

      public static int K
      The number of solutions which should be compared in each round of the K-way tournament selector.

  • Constructor Details

    • MealOption

      public MealOption(FitnessCalculator fitnessCalc)
      Constructor for the MealOption class. It takes in a fitness calculator, which is set with the correct constraints for the meal.
      Parameters:
      fitnessCalc - the fitness calculator object with which to evaluate the chromosomes.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method is internally called in Meal when thread.start(); is called. It runs the genetic algorithm and saves the generated meal option in the aliments list.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • getAliments

      public List<Aliment> getAliments()
      Getter for the aliments list.
      Returns:
      the aliment list.

    • addAll

      public void addAll(List<Aliment> aliments)
      replaces the aliments list with another aliments list. It is used in MealOptionEditorWindowController, to manually modify the meal option.
      Parameters:
      aliments - the new aliments list which should be added.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Method for converting the mealOption to string. by joining the name of each aliment and its amount (serving size * number of servings) with a + sign. This is used in diet display window to display the meal options in the tables.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
